Looks like hover in a static method (i.e. no "this").

Fixed in JavaDebugHover, and JDIReferenceType. In JavaDebugHover, we must 
search for the variable in the type if it is a static method, otherwise search 
in the object. In JDIReferenceType, we were returning invalid "field 
variables" when asking a type for a field that was non-static. The API claimed 
to return null, unless the field being requested is static 
(IJavaReferenceType.getField(...)).
